column4: the Phnom Penh Municipal Court sentenced a Taiwanese man to 30 years imprisonment and a fine of 80 million riel for trafficking illegal drugs into Cambodia. ------TSAI JAN KO
column5: a 58-year-old Taiwanese man was arrested by police on December 29
column11: 72.06 g of ice amphetamine and WY  pills weighing 121.05 grams (total of over 4 kg) were found with the man. ------https://kohsantepheapdaily.com.kh/article/792640.html
